original_text: And it was told Saul that David was fled to Gath: and he sought no more again for him.
korean_text: 다윗이 가드에 도망한 것을 어떤 사람이 사울에게 전하매 사울이 다시는 그를 수색하지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: that David was fled to Gath
and he sought no more again for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 이상 그를 찾지 않았다
